TopicTitle: Direct X 11 or Nvidia 745M or OpenGL for graphics card + performance

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

With 1.1 came performance increases.  The title says it all, I was just wondering.  Which one of those will get you the best mix of graphics and performance.  For example, I don't want 144p graphics but 120 fps, but at the same time, 1440 p graphics with 12 fps won't work either.  Discuss below!

Edited April 21, 2016 by TwinKerbal
forgot to type the explanation *facepalm*
Unless I'm mistaken, OpenGL and DX11 don't work in 1.1. Well, OGL works on Linux, obviously, maybe on Mac, but not on Windows.

3 minutes ago, symmeclept said:

Unless I'm mistaken, OpenGL and DX11 don't work in 1.1. Well, OGL works on Linux, obviously, maybe on Mac, but not on Windows.

The question still remains, direct x or nvidia?
Those are two completely different things. The question you're trying to ask is Nvidia or AMD, since you have no choice but to use DirectX.

1 hour ago, symmeclept said:

Those are two completely different things. The question you're trying to ask is Nvidia or AMD, since you have no choice but to use DirectX.

Ok then. Ty for telling me
